member.name: T:COSML.UnityUtils
member.summary: Class containing extensions used by COSML for interacting with Unity types.

member.name: M:COSML.UnityUtils.GetOrAddComponent``1(UnityEngine.GameObject)
member.summary: Get the component of type T attached to GameObject go. If go does not have such a component, add that component (and return it).

member.name: M:COSML.UnityUtils.FindGameObject(UnityEngine.SceneManagement.Scene,System.String)
member.summary: Find a game object by name in the scene. The object's name must be given in the hierarchy.
member.param: The name of the object in the hierarchy, with '/' separating parent GameObjects from child GameObjects.
member.returns: The GameObject if found; null if not.
member.exception: Thrown if the path to the game object is invalid.

member.name: M:COSML.UnityUtils.FindGreatestWidth(UnityEngine.UI.Text,System.Object[])
member.summary: Get the max width of a text.

member.name: M:COSML.UnityUtils.ClearChildren(UnityEngine.GameObject,System.Func{UnityEngine.GameObject,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Destroy a gameobject's children by condition.

member.name: M:COSML.UnityUtils.GetPath(UnityEngine.Transform)
member.summary: Get the full path of a GameObject/Component
